_header: My pained ghost enforceth me complain
Title(s): ‘Thus pitously my deth ye do contryve’
Subjects: complaints; love lyrics; envoys; lovers’ plea
_description: ‘Thus pitously my deth ye do contryve’ — three 8-line stanzas with this refrain and 4-line Envoy (associated with Charles d’Orléans)

BLHar682.First Lines: My paynyd gost enforsith me complayneOn loue and swete foo on yowre crewelte…
BLHar682.Last Lines: …Myn hert also with castis of myn eyeThus pitously my deth ye do contryve
